title: 怎么禁止生成暮色传送门
author: duoduoduoduoduo

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
服务器上，打开 config/twilightforest.cfg

设置
    B:disablePortalCreation=true

replies.author: kiod
replies.txt_content:
# Allow portals only for admins (ops).  This severly reduces the range in which the mod usually scans for valid portal conditions, and it scans near ops only.
    B:AdminOnlyPortals=false
   false 改成 true 就只有OP能开启暮色门 
生成世界之后把传送门挖了，设置地标就行了

replies.author: duoduoduoduoduo
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-30 11:47
服务器上，打开 config/twilightforest.cfg

设置
嗯解决了
